speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Oh wait, maybe a little to early for that. What's up, Andi here! Good Morning to ya, and once again, thanks for taking over the workshop for me while I am gone!

speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Anyways, welcome to the workshop! Pretty cool place right? I know it may be a little cramped but we engineers like the enclosed space ya know?

speaker: sad_andi
dialog: Come on! Let me show you around and explain how you will be handling your job. Well, not me in-person but using my security cam footage. You get the point though.

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: Soooo…. you will now have to take new orders that have different colors.

speaker: sad_andi
dialog: The first thing that you will do is to take a look at orders. See that large tablet on your right? Click on the tablet to print the ticket and see what the customers would like.

speaker: sad_andi
dialog: Now that you'll know what part combinations your customers want

speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Look, I’m sure you’ll manage. Just make the robots and now paint them in a color the customers would want. Before your shift activate the P.E.N.S machine and install the colors. The display will show buttons of color, which will spray your robots with paint!

speaker: happy_andi
dialog: Pretty handy right? Saves you from the hassle of spraying your hands with paint. You know that feeling when you wash your hands for hours ot get the stain off? Not pleasant.

speaker: laugh_andi
dialog: Anyways, I’ll be off! Surfing Lessons are calling me!
